title: FS T206 Bender with Trees P350 PSA 4.5
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS T206 Bender with Trees P350 PSA 4.5
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
I was able to upgrade my Bender Trees back, so need to let this one go.
VCP PSA 4.5= $586 and PSA 4 @ $505

How about $510

Payment via Zelle or PayPal (net to me)

PM to take it. I would also consider an American Beauty HOFer in 3-4 grade as trade. A straight up buy takes it over ongoing trade negotiations though, as always.

Thanks,
Bob
